tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_prices (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(255),
    price_per_kwh DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  consumption_month INT,
  consumption_year INT,
  consumption_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyPlans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    provider_id INT NOT NULL,
    plan_cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    plan_duration INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PriceComparison (
    comparison_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    plan_id INT NOT NULL,
    comparison_date DATE NOT NULL,
    recommended_provider_id INT NOT NULL
);
